item.title: [ASP.NET] 自動寄信
item.description: 一樣是紀綠一下… MailMessage mailMessage = new MailMessage(); mailMessage.IsBodyHtml = true; mailMessage.To.Add(emailAddress); mailMessage.CC.Add(cCMailAddress); MailAddress fromWho = new MailAddress(senderMailAddress); mailMessage.From = fromWho; mailMessage.Subject = title; mailMessage.Body = "這邊可放html" SmtpClient mailSmtp = new SmtpClient(mailServer,mailServerPort); mailSmtp.Send(mailMessage);
